name: Sabrent Rocket 5 2TB
description: Enthusiast PCIe 5.0 SSD with 14,000MB/s reads at competitive pricing. Great value for early adopters of Gen5 storage technology.

reviews.review_text: Gen5 speeds at Gen4 flagship prices. Great deal.
Sabrent delivers again. Reliable and fast.
Good drive but included heatsink is basic.
